title: Getting Started in Qlik Sense
headline: Pick up the data visualisation skills required to improve decision-making in this free online data science course.
description: Learn how to work with Qlik Sense, a self-service business intelligence and visual analytics platform, in this free online course. You will master the essentials of navigating Qlik Sense by learning to load data and creating and loading apps. You will also learn about editing your visualisation in addition to publishing and sharing apps. This course is particularly beneficial for those wanting to use data and visual analytics for quick insights.
courseDescription:
Expanding global markets are generating large amounts of data that needs to be analysed for better decision-making and solving challenging issues. Data visualisation makes it easier for us to detect patterns and trends in a mountain of information. Qlik Sense is a modern, self-service data analytics platform which enables you to create visuals that present data in an easy-to-understand format. This course will explain what and how you use Qlik Sense and its coding language. It will help you gain confidence in navigating the platform, explaining common terminologies and examining Qlik Sense's advantages. We introduce you to the different environments like Qlik Sense Desktop and Qlik Sense Enterprise. You will learn how to choose these environments.

The hands-on video tutorials will guide you through Qlik Sense Hub and Qlik Sense Windows as you explore its interface. You will learn how to load data and receive the necessary guidance on creating and loading apps on Qlik Sense, which is secure, centrally managed and can scale across the cloud. Creating an app on this platform is a matter of pushing a button. You will learn about the optimal thumbnail aspect ratio, supported image files and other details about file extensions along with the different versions of Qlik Sense. Explore how to insert a chart, guidelines and best practices for creating visualisation and how to edit the graphs and charts once you have constructed them. Each topic has a short review section to help outline its key points.

Finally, the course will focus on how to publish and share Qlik Sense apps in addition to the data assets in visualisation. Where are the published apps located? How are these different from the apps created in the hub? You will understand the meaning of the terms ‘stream’ and ‘public’ sheets/stories in this context. A thorough explanation of data asset types will simplify the visualisation facts such as template scheme, dimensions, measures and master items. Businesses are becoming increasingly data-driven and want to make good use of data for profitable decision-making. There thus is a great demand for people proficient in Qlik Sense. You can learn to create meaningful, exciting reports that provide business insights to add value to your professional skills. In addition, you can polish your general data analytics, data literacy and visualisation expertise. Take advantage of this free online course and step into the contemporary world of data analytics.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:

  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
